'''Ryan Gage''' is an English actor who portrayed [[Alfrid|Alfrid Lickspittle]] in [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug|''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'']] and [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies|''The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armie''s]].<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Peter Jackson]]|articleurl=http://www.facebook.com/note.php?note_id=10150257180211558|articlename=Casting News for The Hobbit|dated=19-May-2011|website=[http://www.facebook.com/ Facebook]|accessed=22-Dec-2011}}</ref> He was originally cast as [[Drogo Baggins]], father of [[Frodo Baggins]], but his role was later changed.<ref>{{webcite|website=[http://www.twitter.com Twitter]|articleurl=http://twitter.com/RyanGage/status/388856306767245313|articlename=Ryan Gage on Twitter|accessed=11 November 2014|dated=12 October 2013}}</ref> He was born in [[Coventry]] and went on to attend the BRIT School and later trained at Drama Centre London.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://screenmayhem.com/ryan-gage-on-fulfilling-his-dream-of-being-in-red-dwarf-playing-a-wrongun-in-the-hobbit-and-directing-a-play-on-londons-west-end/|articlename=We Talk to Actor Ryan Gage about Fulfilling His Dream of Being in Red Dwarf and Playing a Wrongâ€™un in The Hobbit|author=Hermione Flavia|dated=15 October 2017|accessed=23 October 2024}}</ref>

==Awards==
*[[2014]] - '''[http://www.caprihollywood.com/ Capri Hollywood Award]''', Breakout Actor Award, ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''
*2014 - '''Capri Film Festival, Italy''', Breakout Actor Award, ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''
